name: The Lineup
description:
You're a clairvoyant consultant hired by detectives to bring assailants to Justice. Hover your third eye over the victim's body to access their memory. Pay attention to the vision of the morphing attacker and match it to one of the dudes in the lineup.

This is the prototype. The full game is in development for itch.io and was green lit for Steam. Help me buy some Ramen so I can finish.

What to expect later: Capture assailants in the monster database and organize them into gangs with specific traits. Match murder weapons to clues from the victim's body. Strengthen psychic powers with tons of new psychic puzzles that unlock new visions!
